entry.title: TID 03-04-2020 Product Hunt Time Machine
entry.summary: To discover new things, a lot of web resources exist. You can use google to have informations on new trends, follow your favourite tech news blog or subscribe to RSS feed via Feedly for example. Few months ago, I discovered Product Hunt, where people and…
entry.content:
To discover new things, a lot of web resources exist. You can use google to have informations on new trends, follow your favourite tech news blog or subscribe to RSS feed via Feedly for example. Few months ago, I discovered Product Hunt, where people and companies can submit their new product and the community vote everyday for the best new one. 

A lot of products are interesting but sometimes, only the most voted one is really interesting (we can't disrupt everything everyday, right?) That's why exists Product Hunt Time Machine, compiling all the "most voted hunt from every day since Product Hunt records began".  

With this list, there is no reason to discover new things easily! 

 

Enjoy!

entry.title: TID 01-04-2020 Tarantino's reviews (no joke)
entry.summary: If you like Tarantino's movie as much as I like them, you may find interesting to know which movies he is watching. Thanks to a reddit post in r/movies sub, I discovered Quentin Tarantino's reviews. And they are as interesting as his movies. You will have…
entry.content:
If you like Tarantino's movie as much as I like them, you may find interesting to know which movies he is watching. Thanks to a reddit post in r/movies sub, I discovered Quentin Tarantino's reviews. And they are as interesting as his movies. You  will have reviews on old obscurs movies and more recent or better known too. Long enough to have a good point of view of what he thinks about a movie, I found interesting to see himself sharing his love for them.

 

Enjoy !

entry.title: TID 31-03-2020 Design Valley
entry.summary: New day, new website ! Today I discovered Design Valley, an interesting website displaying a curated list of web design tools. In the list, you can find websites color palettes helpers, mockup tools, UI kits an dmany more. I like how simple it is displayed…
entry.content:
New day, new website ! Today I discovered Design Valley, an interesting website displaying a curated list of web design tools. In the list, you can find websites color palettes helpers, mockup tools, UI kits an dmany more. I like how simple it is displayed and easy to find resources you need. 

For any of your needs about webdesign, you should take a look. On my side, it is already bookmaked !! 

 

Enjoy!

entry.title: TIL 30-03-2020 Git push --atomic
entry.summary: For continuous integration puropses, I need to be sure some of my commits are all done together. If some fail for some reasons, I have to reconciliate everything t o be sure it is ok. After some research, I found a git command that helped…
entry.content:
For continuous integration puropses, I need to be sure some of my commits are all done together. If some fail for some reasons, I have to reconciliate everything t o be sure it is ok. After some research, I found a git command that helped me a lot: 

git push --atomic origin branch1 branch2 ...

 The idea with this command is to have only one commit doing multiple things. It can help to merge, tag and add a note in a single command for example. 

For more informations, you can read this github article. 

 

Enjoy!

entry.title: TID 27-03-2020 NovoResume
entry.summary: I needed to recreate a resume and I didn't want to do it with MS Word or with Latex as I did before. As a web developer, i was almost sure some web resources exist. After googling for few minutes, I discovered Novo Resume . The website…
entry.content:
I needed to recreate a resume and I didn't want to do it with MS Word or with Latex as I did before. As a web developer, i was almost sure some web resources exist. After googling for few minutes, I discovered Novo Resume .

The website is very user friendly and I created my resume in less than an hour with a good result. You can choose differents templates and customize them with differents colors or fonts. Some of them are free, other can be used only with an upgraded account.

Upgraded account brings more templates and more customization. You still can try all these option to your free account but you will not be able to download your resume. 

All your changes are automatically saved and you can download your resume in PDF. 

It is easy! You should try it !

entry.title: TID 26-03-2020 30 seconds of code
entry.summary: A snippet code website: 30 seconds of code This website provides cool and easy code snippets that can be helpful for web developments. Sometimes, you need CSS animations for a button, a React dropdown or a method to find index with Python. This website can help…
entry.content:
A snippet code website: 30 seconds of code

This website provides cool and easy code snippets that can be helpful for web developments. Sometimes, you need CSS animations for a button, a React dropdown or a method to find index with Python. This website can help with its small pieces of code. 

 I like:  Code snippets easily available

 

Enjoy!

entry.title: TID 25-03-2020: A youtube channel : Design Course
entry.summary: A youtube channel : Design Course It is a very good youtube channel with amazing content. Every video is clear and concise. I like how everything is displayed and explained. I started to watch a lot of its video today and I want to reproduce almost all…
entry.content:
A youtube channel : Design Course

It is a very good youtube channel with amazing content. Every video is clear and concise. I like how everything is displayed and  explained. I started to watch a lot of its video today and I want to reproduce almost all of them. He makes a lot of design courses and dome design reviews. For everyone interested by webdesign and front end development, I recommend this channel!
